summary: This is an email chain from August 2021 between a federal prosecutor and law enforcement regarding the Epstein investigation. The prosecutor requests photos referenced in an FBI 302 report and information on an individual's place of birth and citizenship, and attaches several historical email files from 2008-2012 involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the subject line and in the filenames of several attached historical emails from 2008-2012.

events.title: Prosecutor requests evidence from FBI 302
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails the FBI and NYPD to request photos referenced in an attached FBI 302 report and to confirm an individual's place of birth and citizenship.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
UK (mentioned as suspected place of birth and citizenship)
keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email from a federal prosecutor actively following up on evidence in the Epstein investigation.
The prosecutor references an FBI 302 report that mentions attached photos stored in a '1A'.
The prosecutor seeks to confirm an individual's place of birth and citizenship, suspecting they are from the UK.
Several historical email attachments from 2008-2012 involving Jeffrey Epstein are referenced, indicating a review of long-term communications.
